sub_title: Sr. Project manager at Securitas Belgium
summary:
Experienced Project manager/Program manager who has been responsible for several programs within Telecoms and Logistics:

- Development and implementation of a trunking network
- Development and implementations of customer networks
- Network migrations
- Digital Video Broadcasting; development and realization of new sites
- Development of a data centre
- Maintaining a platform (mobile telephone) via third parties
- Development and roll-out of a DSL network
- Development of and migration to central data platform (I-mode)
- Millennium projects at an oil refinery plant
- Development and implementation of a new container operations system

Specialties: Project & Program management: Telecommunications, Distribution, Logistics, Harbour and Oilrefinery
